window.title: Settings - CopyPaste
window.heading: Settings
window.subtitle: Changes are saved to MyM.json and require restart.

startup.heading: STARTUP
startup.runOnStartupDesc: Launches in background when you sign in

appearance.heading: APPEARANCE
appearance.panelWidthTooltip: Sidebar panel width in pixels. Recommended: 400-500px
appearance.marginTopTooltip: Space between the top of the screen and the panel. Allows adjusting vertical position.
appearance.marginBottomTooltip: Space between the bottom of the screen and the panel. Useful if you have a large taskbar.
appearance.cardMinLinesDesc: Text lines when card is collapsed
appearance.cardMinLinesTooltip: Number of visible lines when the card is collapsed. Recommended: 2-4 lines.
appearance.cardMaxLinesDesc: Text lines when card is expanded
appearance.cardMaxLinesTooltip: Number of visible lines when you expand the card. Recommended: 6-12 lines.
appearance.resetScrollOnShowDesc: Resets scroll and selects the latest item
appearance.resetScrollOnShowTooltip: When enabled, the list scrolls to the top and selects the most recent item each time the window opens.

behavior.heading: BEHAVIOR
behavior.resetFilterMode: Return to Content mode on open
behavior.resetFilterModeDesc: If off, stays in the last used mode

categories.heading: CATEGORIES
categories.desc: Customize the names of color categories.

storage.heading: STORAGE
storage.retentionTooltip: Days to keep clipboard history. 0 = unlimited. Pinned items are never deleted.

paste.heading: PASTE
paste.intro: Automatic paste speed. Normal/Safe recommended for most computers.
paste.speedTooltip: Fast = powerful computers (may fail). Normal = balanced. Safe = conservative. Slow = old computers.
paste.warning:
⚠️ Fast: May cause strange behavior in heavy apps.
⚠️ Slow: May feel like a failure on modern computers.

thumbnail.heading: THUMBNAILS (ADVANCED)
thumbnail.warning: Modifying can affect RAM usage and disk space.
thumbnail.qualityTooltip: Select a quality preset. Excellent = better quality but more RAM. Minimal = minimal resource usage.

errors.saveFailed: Failed to save. Check permissions for the configuration folder.

help.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
help.subtitle: Power your workflow with these shortcuts

down.desc: Navigate from search to clipboard items

filterContent.desc: Switch to Content filter mode (text search)

filterCategory.desc: Switch to Category filter mode (by color)

filterType.desc: Switch to Type filter mode (by item type)

right.desc: Expand/collapse selected card to see more text

enter.desc: Paste selected item and return to previous app
